user_initial_prompt: build a backend for online bakery shop
tech_stack_summary: Web Development → Backend → REST → JavaScript/TypeScript → NestJS → NGINX

Core Application & Web Stacks -> Web Dev.rationale: To build a backend for an online bakery shop, a web development stack is necessary to create a web application that can interact with users and provide a user interface.
Core Application & Web Stacks -> Web Dev.purpose: Enables building a web application for the online bakery shop

Web Development -> Backend.rationale: To build a backend for online bakery shop
Web Development -> Backend.purpose: Enables creation of server-side logic and API

Backend -> REST.rationale: most widely adopted and easy to implement
Backend -> REST.purpose: enables building a scalable and maintainable API

REST -> JavaScript/TypeScript.rationale: Modern and popular choice for building scalable and maintainable RESTful APIs
REST -> JavaScript/TypeScript.purpose: Enables building a fast, secure, and efficient backend for the online bakery shop

JavaScript/TypeScript -> NestJS.rationale: Robust, scalable, and maintainable framework with strong typing
JavaScript/TypeScript -> NestJS.purpose: Enables building a robust and scalable backend for the online bakery shop

NestJS -> NGINX.rationale: NGINX is a popular and widely-used web server that can efficiently handle high traffic and is well-suited for a production environment.
NestJS -> NGINX.purpose: To serve as a reverse proxy and handle incoming HTTP requests
